subject: Public Speaking
title: Finding Stories in Your Life
description: A quick, practical guide to Finding Stories in Your Life.

hook.text: You have hundreds of stories. You just haven't noticed them.

buildup.text: Stories hide in failures, surprises, and ordinary moments.

discovery.text: Keep a story journal. Write down moments that moved you.

twist.text: Everyday moments become powerful stories when told with meaning.

climax.text: The best speech stories come from real, personal experiences.

punchline.text: Journal your life. Stories are everywhere.

quiz.question: Where do speech stories come from?
